page.title: 20MY FAVOURITE THINGS! (2)
page.content: {MY FAVOURITE PASTIME:} Fishing is my best hobby. My friend Philip & I go down to the{THAMES}at Kingston to fish for roach. We use peas & scraps of bacon for bait. I usually catch the 213A bus from my home in New Malden. {MY FAVOURITE PLACES:} 1. The{KINGFISHER SWIMMING POOL}in Kingston is great. They have a wave machine, & sometimes huge inflatable toys for children to climb on. 2. The{1ST TOLWORTH SCOUTS}meet every Friday evening. I usually cycle down (it's about 2 miles). We have air_rifle shooting, snooker & swimming. 3.{CHARRINGTON BOWL}is a 10_pin bowling alley in Tolworth. Bowlers must wear the special shoes provided; this protects the wooden floors of the lanes.I like the electronic games,too!
